ruling: - You can discard [[Thunder Dragon]] to activate its effect even if it would not go to your Graveyard. For example, when [[Banisher of the Light]] is face-up on the field.
- If you have your opponent's [[Thunder Dragon]] in your hand because of [[Exchange]], you can discard it to activate its effect and search your Deck for up to 2 [[Thunder Dragon]]s.
- You cannot discard [[Thunder Dragon]] to activate its effect if you do not have any [[Thunder Dragon]] in your Deck.
